movie.title: Ram Setu
movie.description: An archaeologist investigates the legendary Ram Setu to determine if it's a natural formation or man-made.

movie.title: Drishyam 2
movie.description: Vijay Salgaonkar's story continues as new clues resurface in the murder investigation.

movie.title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
movie.description: Rocky takes charge of the Kolar Gold Fields and faces new adversaries.

movie.title: Dhoom Dhaam
movie.genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, The Great Battel
movie.description: Veer Poddar and Koyal Chadda are a mismatched couple, who get into an arranged marriage. A case of mistaken identity forces this newly married couple to go on the run on their wedding night and search for the mysterious "Charlie".

movie.title: Chhaava
movie.genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, The Great Battle
movie.description: A historical drama based on the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.

movie.title: Baby John
movie.genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, The Great Battel
movie.description: Revolves around a DCP who transforms and travels to a different place in order to safeguard his family.

movie.title: Baida
movie.description: A former spy gets entrapped into the dark world of a man who has defied the cycle of time and death, bearing sinister abilities.

movie.title: Marco
movie.description: The adoptive son of the Adattu family, Marco, sets off on a ruthless quest for vengeance after his brother is brutally murdered, finding only betrayal, loss and unimaginable brutality at every step.

movie.title: Game Changer
movie.description: An honest IAS officer's fight against a corrupt political system through fair and transparent elections.

movie.title: Kraven the Hunter
movie.description: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai Kravinoff, starts him down a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

movie.title: Mufasa: The Lion King
movie.description: Mufasa, a cub lost and alone, meets a sympathetic lion named Taka, the heir to a royal bloodline. The chance meeting sets in motion an expansive journey of a group of misfits searching for their destiny.

movie.title: Crazxy
movie.description: Abhimanyu Sood. Good surgeon. Bad father. Questionable human being. He is having the worst day of his life.

movie.title: Tumko Meri Kasam

movie.title: Snow White
movie.description: A princess joins forces with seven dwarfs to liberate her kingdom from her cruel stepmother the Evil Queen. A live-action adaptation of the 1937 Disney animated film 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'.
